turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: From where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice choice. Do you know what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are my options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, coconut, nonfat, whole, 2%, and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I will go with Almond.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! And how about whipped cream? Yay or nay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yay!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want this for pickup, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks did you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 1000 Oakvale Rd, Princeton, West Virginia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. An order has been placed for a Cherry Mocha with Almond milk in a size Venti with whipped cream. It will be ready for pick up at 1000 Oakvale Rd, Princeton, West Virginia in 15 minutes. You should be receiving a text message shortly with your receipt. The total came to $5.45

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be there! Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It was no problem.
